name: Perry Schneider Throw Pillow
description: Pisscoin Home Collection Summer Season 2021 Catalog #02 - Relax and let Pisscoin™️ remove some of your guesswork! - Create a picture perfect look with this beautiful throw pillow from Pisscoin Home Collection. Buyer of this OBJKT will receive the artist’s proof of the Perry Schneider Throw Pillow with Hidden Zipper (18 x 18 in) seen here*, signed by Pisscoin Home Collection Chief Creative Officer, Pis Pistofferson. Shipping fees are included for addresses anywhere in the continental United States. After purchase, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram with shipping address. Item will ship within 5-7 days of purchase. For collectors outside the continental US and for all other inquiries about the artwork, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram. *Only for the first sale. Resale is subject to the Guzzler’s Oath. Any collector purchasing this OBJKT through the secondary market should contact the current owner and @dgpgallerie on Instagram to confirm the good(s) for sale.
